title: Provided that in case of development of reservations of Rehabilitation & Resettlement under the CDS, BUA equal to 30% of the Zonal (basic) FSI shall be handed over to the MCGM free of FSI and free of cost, in addition to the rehabilitation of the existing tenements or users if any
clause_text: Provided that in case of development of reservations of Rehabilitation & Resettlement under the CDS, BUA equal to 30% of the Zonal (basic) FSI shall be handed over to the MCGM free of FSI and free of cost, in addition to the rehabilitation of the existing tenements or users if any.
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):
